H0.text: What pope resigned in 2013. Pope Benedict XVI's predecessor, Pope John Paul II

H1.text: What pope resigned in 2013. Pope Gregory XII

H2.text: What pope resigned in 2013. Pope Celestine V

A4.text: Pope Benedict XVI resigned as pope on 28 February 2013.

A5.text: Benedict was the first pope to resign without external pressure since Celestine V in 1294.
